Description: Alabastron: the vessel is of traditional form with slightly tapering body, wide, fiat rim and two small lugs near the shoulder, in translucent dark-blue glass. An elaborate clustered feathered pattern in opaque white, pale-blue, and yellow, all matt, covers virtually the entire body. The rim is outlined with a yellow thread. Core built.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
